<Heading as={'h1'} className={'openapi__heading'} children={'Delete all chat messages'}></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint method={'delete'} path={'/chatmessage/{id}'} context={'endpoint'}></MethodEndpoint>

Delete all chat messages for a specific chatflow.

<Heading id={'request'} as={'h2'} className={'openapi-tabs__heading'} children={'Request'}></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
    parameters={[
        { in: 'path', name: 'id', required: true, schema: { type: 'string' }, description: 'Chatflow ID' },
        { in: 'query', name: 'chatId', schema: { type: 'string' }, description: 'Filter by chat ID' },
        { in: 'query', name: 'memoryType', schema: { type: 'string', example: 'Buffer Memory' }, description: 'Filter by memory type' },
        { in: 'query', name: 'sessionId', schema: { type: 'string' }, description: 'Filter by session ID' },
        { in: 'query', name: 'chatType', schema: { type: 'string', enum: ['INTERNAL', 'EXTERNAL'] }, description: 'Filter by chat type' }
    ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

                        title: 'Error'

                }
            }
        },

            description: 'Chat messages not found',
